org.mitre.provenance.simulate.attack

Class BaseGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.provenance.simulate.attack.BaseGraph
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataModificationAttack, DataStealingAttack, DisruptionAttack, ManInTheMiddleAttack, SeverAttack

    public class BaseGraph
extends Object
    This is a model of a base NCEL graph, re-created in code. Subclasses will launch different kinds of attacks on this graph.
    Author:
    DMALLEN
